description: Police said there had been "unacceptable incidents" linked to a Congolese singer's concert.
title: Paris Gare de Lyon: Fire at station amid DR Congo concert protest
title_page: Paris Gare de Lyon: Fire at station amid DR Congo concert protest - BBC News
maintext: Fally Ipupa is the first Congolese artist to perform in Europe since then. It is a historic moment for Congolese music. Many people are saying that his concert will pave the way for others to perform. It is a challenge to members of the diaspora and they do not like it.
